import React, {useEffect} from 'react'; import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import Spinner from 'react-bootstrap/Spinner'; import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions'; const ProductScreen = () => { const {id} = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productDetails = useSelector((state) => st) useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) },[id, dispatch]) const product = {} return ( <> Go Back {!product ? ( Loading... ) :(

{product.name}

 מחיר: ${product.price} {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'זמין במלאי' : 'חסר במלאי'} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
